name: Web Organizer
description: A one-stop-shop to house all of your important bookmarks, from recipes to javascript tutorials, so that you do not have to waste time sifting through your onetab.

name: Burger Time
description: A place to make a wishlist of all the burgers you want to enjoy, and then cross them off as you devour them.

name: Campsite Finder
description: An app that allows you to search for all campsites within a desired state.

name: Note Taker
description: Allows you to take, save, and delete notes to stay organized in your life.

name: Javascript Quiz
description: A quick quiz app to test your javascript knowledge

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A simple weather dashboard to show you the current and 5 day forecast for your desired city
